content.body: yulia | OOO until sept 26th: I’ve started working on a Module Harmony tech tree, arrows from motivating uses cases to features. To get there, I’m starting with a sketch of the graph, instead of starting with prose. I’m this far: https://gist.github.com/kriskowal/268d46617cd68015b811a2f5fdaf3217
